isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON 2000 SERIES™ (LCT) TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - Special Tools

sstools.para: Allison Jumper Wire Kit - J39197. This kit is available from authorized Allison dealers.
Allison Breakout Box - J 43799. This item is available from authorized Allison dealers.
TransPro diagnostic software. This software is available through Kent-Moore Heavy-Duty Division.
International engine controller breakout box ZTSE-4445. This item is available through Kent-Moore Heavy-Duty Division.
